changes.comment: Add support for storybook 7, HMR, and breaking chages in the plugin configuration option. The "startupModulePath" and "staticBuildModulePath" have been removed in favour of "cliCallingConvention" and "cliPackageName". A new 'cwdPackageName' option provides the ability to set an alternative dependency name as (cwd) target for the storybook commands.
